title: Verify responsive top navigation bar displays correctly and is sticky
description: Check that the top navigation bar is visible, responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes, and stays fixed/sticky on scroll.

steps.description: Load the personal portfolio website on desktop resolution
Confirm top navigation bar is visible and positioned at top fixed when scrolling down
Resize browser or open on tablet resolution
Confirm navigation bar adjusts layout appropriately and remains sticky on scroll
Resize browser or open on mobile resolution
Confirm mobile view shows collapsed hamburger menu and sticky navigation bar on scroll

title: Test mobile menu toggle functionality
description: Verify that the hamburger menu toggle on mobile opens and closes the mobile navigation menu reliably.

steps.description: Open site on mobile device or narrow viewport
Locate and click the hamburger menu toggle button
Confirm that the mobile navigation menu expands and links are visible
Click the toggle button again
Confirm that the mobile navigation menu collapses and links are hidden

title: Verify anchor-based navigation links scroll smoothly to sections
description: Check that clicking navigation links scrolls the page smoothly to the correct anchor sections.

steps.description: Click the About link in navigation bar
Page smoothly scrolls to About section and section heading is visible
Click the Skills link
Page smoothly scrolls to Skills section
Click the Projects link
Page smoothly scrolls to Project Gallery section
Click the Contact link
Page smoothly scrolls to Contact section

title: Validate Hero section content and call-to-action buttons
description: Ensure the Hero section displays the name, professional title, introduction, social links, and call-to-action buttons correctly and links work.

steps.description: Load the homepage
Verify name and professional title are displayed clearly
Verify introduction text is visible and readable
Verify social links are present and clicking each opens the respective profile in a new tab
Verify call-to-action buttons are visible and clickable
Click each call-to-action button
Verify appropriate actions triggered, e.g. scroll to contact section or download CV if applicable

title: Validate About section displays biography and technology list
description: Check the About section shows the professional summary and listed technologies correctly and formatted well.

steps.description: Navigate to the About section
Check biography text is present and readable
Verify list of technologies is displayed with appropriate icons or badges
Check no missing data or broken formatting in this section

title: Verify Skills section shows grouped technical skills with icons
description: Verify that Skills section presents grouped skills with proper icons or badges and correct categorization.

steps.description: Navigate to the Skills section
Confirm groups/categories of skills exist and contain relevant items
Verify that each skill item has an icon or badge associated with it
Confirm skills are visually consistent and formatted properly

title: Test Project gallery with category filtering functionality
description: Ensure project gallery loads all projects by default and filters displayed projects correctly upon category selection.

steps.description: Navigate to Projects section
Verify all project cards are visible by default
Click each category filter (e.g. React, Backend)
Confirm only projects belonging to the selected category are displayed
Select 'All' category filter
Verify that all projects are again displayed

title: Verify each project card content and detail links
description: Check project cards display title, description, tech stack icons, and that live demo and GitHub links open correctly in new tabs.

steps.description: View all project cards in the gallery
Confirm each project card shows title and description
Verify presence of visual tech stack icons or badges
Click the live demo link on a project card
Confirm live demo opens in a new browser tab
Click the GitHub source code link on a project card
Confirm GitHub page opens correctly in a new tab

title: Validate Contact section clickable cards open correct platforms
description: Check that contact cards for email, LinkedIn, GitHub, and Telegram are clickable and open the corresponding email client or external profile link in new tabs.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact section
Ensure contact cards for email, LinkedIn, GitHub and Telegram are visible
Click the email contact card
Verify default email client opens with correct recipient address
Click LinkedIn contact card
Verify LinkedIn profile opens in a new tab
Click GitHub contact card
Verify GitHub profile opens in a new tab
Click Telegram contact card
Verify Telegram profile or chat opens in a new tab

title: Verify theme toggle button switches between Light and Dark modes
description: Test that the theme toggle button successfully changes the website between Light and Dark visual modes and preserves accessibility standards.

steps.description: Locate and click the theme toggle button
Confirm website switches from Light mode to Dark mode UI
Click the theme toggle button again
Confirm website switches back from Dark mode to Light mode
Verify all text and UI elements maintain readability and WCAG color contrast in both modes

title: Validate interactive Moroccan-inspired background animation
description: Check that the background animation responds fluidly and correctly to mouse movements and scroll actions without causing UI distraction or performance issues.

steps.description: Move mouse cursor across the background area
Confirm Moroccan-inspired animation responds gracefully to cursor positioning
Scroll the webpage up and down
Verify animation reacts fluidly to scroll events
Ensure animation performance is smooth and does not cause jank or lag

title: Check static data configuration loads and displays correctly
description: Verify that all content displayed on the website, including site details and project information, is correctly loaded from the static configuration files and no data is missing or broken.

steps.description: Load the website
Verify no placeholder or missing data text is visible anywhere
Confirm all project cards data match the static configuration data precisely
Check all sections (About, Skills, Contact) have content loaded only from static configuration sources

title: Validate UI consistency and accessibility on desktop, tablet, and mobile
description: Ensure that the websiteâ€™s design is professionally consistent across devices and all UI elements maintain accessibility, readability, and correct color contrast for both Light and Dark modes.

steps.description: Open the website on desktop view
Check visual consistency and WCAG compliance for Light mode
Toggle to Dark mode
Check visual consistency and WCAG compliance for Dark mode
Repeat above steps on tablet and mobile screen sizes
Verify readability, color contrast, and professional UI/UX consistency on all devices
